question: This state government is going to launch Chatra Parivahan Suraksha Yojana for the safety of girls.
explanation: Haryana government is going to launch Chatra Parivahan Suraksha Yojana for the safety of girls. Under this scheme, all the girl students will get free travel facility from their home to their educational institutions. The primary objective of this scheme is to ensure that the girls feel secure at public places, workplaces and while traveling.
